function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 pandemic spread across the world","Impact":"Massive number of infections and deaths","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing, travel restrictions, and other measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening technology","People":"Global population","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Impact on service industry, including travel and tourism","Impact":"Significant reduction in business, financial losses","Mitigation":"Adopting new social behaviors, implementing safety measures, and exploring alternative business models","Technologies":"Online booking systems, virtual tours, contactless payment systems","People":"Employees, businesses, travelers","Owner":"Business owners, industry associations"},{"Description":"Changes in grocery retail operations due to COVID-19","Impact":"Disruption of retail operations and consumer behaviors","Mitigation":"Implementing safety measures, adapting business models, and ensuring supply chain resilience","Technologies":"Online delivery platforms, contactless payment systems, inventory management software","People":"Retailers, consumers","Owner":"Retailers, supply chain managers"}]}
